document.full_text: vodafone's exit from france's sfr marks another step in the revamp of its portfolio and reflects how europe's telecom giants are ditching weaker assets to achieve scale elsewhere ahead of a wave of big investments.
document.title: vodafone sfr deal reflects wider industry changes
lines_and_colors: vodafone's exit from france's sfr marks another step in the revamp of its portfolio and reflects how europe's telecom giants are ditching weaker assets to achieve scale elsewhere ahead of a wave of big investments.
